name: Captain Panda Across the Night
description:
A game made by Thaumaturge, Simulan, and Epihaius of the Panda3D community.

Soar and swoop through an asteroid field in your choice of metallic spaceships, avoiding the harrying of Mechanoid foes.

Survive long enough to enter the mysterious teleportation portal, and discover the fate of Captain Panda's space station.

This game is an excerpted part of the P3D Space Tech Demo, a Panda3D engine demo.
